00019 #ifndef __EGG_TRAY_ICON_H__
00020 #define __EGG_TRAY_ICON_H__
00021 
00022 #include <gtk/gtkplug.h>
00023 #include <gdk/gdkx.h>
00024 
00025 G_BEGIN_DECLS
00026 #define EGG_TYPE_TRAY_ICON      (egg_tray_icon_get_type ())
00027 #define EGG_TRAY_ICON(obj)      (G_TYPE_CHECK_INSTANCE_CAST ((obj), EGG_TYPE_TRAY_ICON, EggTrayIcon))
00028 #define EGG_TRAY_ICON_CLASS(klass)  (G_TYPE_CHECK_CLASS_CAST ((klass), EGG_TYPE_TRAY_ICON, EggTrayIconClass))
00029 #define EGG_IS_TRAY_ICON(obj)       (G_TYPE_CHECK_INSTANCE_TYPE ((obj), EGG_TYPE_TRAY_ICON))
00030 #define EGG_IS_TRAY_ICON_CLASS(klass)   (G_TYPE_CHECK_CLASS_TYPE ((klass), EGG_TYPE_TRAY_ICON))
00031 #define EGG_TRAY_ICON_GET_CLASS(obj)    (G_TYPE_INSTANCE_GET_CLASS ((obj), EGG_TYPE_TRAY_ICON, EggTrayIconClass))
00032 typedef struct _EggTrayIcon EggTrayIcon;
00033 typedef struct _EggTrayIconClass EggTrayIconClass;
00034 
00035 struct _EggTrayIcon {
00036     GtkPlug parent_instance;
00037     guint stamp;
00038     Atom selection_atom;
00039     Atom manager_atom;
00040     Atom system_tray_opcode_atom;
00041     Atom orientation_atom;
00042     Window manager_window;
00043     GtkOrientation orientation;
00044 };
00045 
00046 struct _EggTrayIconClass {
00047     GtkPlugClass parent_class;
00048 };

00054 void egg_tray_icon_cancel_message (EggTrayIcon * icon, guint id);
